text: Taylor Townsend was the defending champion, but chose not to participate. Madison Brengle won the title, defeating Caroline Dolehide in the final, 6–4, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw Boyd Tinsley Women's Clay Court Classic - Singles
title: 2017 Boyd Tinsley Women's Clay Court Classic – Singles
